Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
doubles \dou"bles\ n. 1. badminton played with two players on each side. [WordNet 1.5]
2. tennis played with two players on each side. [WordNet 1.5]
doubles n 1: badminton played with two players on each side 2: tennis played with two players on each side
